question: Which day is observed on the first Tuesday of May across the world, that is organised by an initiative named ‘GINA’?
explanation:
World Asthma Day (WAD) is an annual event organized by the Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) to improve awareness and care for asthma around the world since 1998. The theme for WAD 2020 planned on May 5 is Enough Asthma Deaths.
The day is observed in collaboration with health care groups and asthma educators all over the world. Asthma is a disease characterized by repeated attacks of breathlessness, wheezing, chest tightness, and cough with varied severity and frequency.
